summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Mar. 2
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Thursday, with five gaining and the other 13 declining.
Bitcoin rose 0.1% to $23,467 by market close.
